sentences.en: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.cn: 添加正确的水量和组装的过滤器.

sentences.en: Expand factory area and adopt the construction method of and assemble at workshop , reassemble at fairground.
sentences.cn: 扩大工厂面积,采用“工场搭装 、 会场组装”的施工方法.

sentences.en: He can strip and reassemble a machine gun in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他能摸着黑儿把机枪拆开再装上.

sentences.en: Her crew was starting to reassemble, now that the bullies had passed.
sentences.cn: 她的伙伴正在重新聚集,那些街霸已经离开.

sentences.en: Reassemble in the reverse order utilizing the new parts from the repair kit.
sentences.cn: 从维修组件中选择新的部件,按照相反顺序重新组装.

sentences.en: Reassemble remaining parts in reverse order.
sentences.cn: 按照相反步骤装配剩下的部件.

sentences.en: Reassemble the check valve module in the reverse order.
sentences.cn: 按照相反顺序重新组装止回模块.

sentences.en: Reassemble the relief valve in the reverse order that it was disassembled.
sentences.cn: 按照拆卸的相反顺序重新组装安全阀.

sentences.en: Reassemble unit as described in the user instructions.
sentences.cn: 按照产品使用说明重新组装.

sentences.en: Rotor shaft processing has been completed, and then reassemble.
sentences.cn: 转子轴加工达成后, 再从头拆散.

sentences.en: The equipment had to be dismantled and reassembled at each new location.
sentences.cn: 得把这些设备拆开来，到各个新的地方重新组装。

sentences.en: We had to take the table apart and reassemble it upstairs.
sentences.cn: 我们只好先把桌子拆开，到楼上再组装起来。

sentences.en: We shall reassemble in the car park in thirty minutes.
sentences.cn: 我们30分钟后在停车场再碰面。

sentences.en: We will now try to reassemble pieces of the wreckage.
sentences.cn: 我们现在会尽量把残骸重新组合起来。

sentences.en: When destroyed, some Necron Warriors may reassemble themselves and rejoin the battle.
sentences.cn: 当破坏, 一些Necron战士可能重新召集他们自己而且再加入战争.

words.tran_cn: 重组的；[电][机] 重新装配的

trans.tran_cn: 重新组装，重新装配，重新召集
trans.tran_en: to bring together the different parts of something to make a whole again, after they have been separated
